definitions.title: vb. denom. Hiph.
definitions.body: be a Nazirite, live as Nazirite, sq. [[מִן]] (abstaining) from (so NH);—only Nu 6 in law of Naz.: Pf. ´[[וְהִזִּיר לי]] consec. v:Nu 6:12; Impf. ´[[יַזִּיר לי]] v:Nu 6:5; also [[יַזִּיר]] …[[מִיַּיִן ]] v:Nu 6:3 from wine… he shall abstain as a Nazirite; Inf. ´[[לְהַזּיר לְי]] v:Nu 6:2, ´[[כָּלָ־יְמֵי הַזּירוֹ לי]] v:Nu 6:6.
